rules_text: {T}: Shifting Arena gains the basic land type of your choice and loses all other types. [i](It gains {T}: Add {W}, {U}, {R}, {B}, or {G})[/i].
flavor_text: [i]When competing in this ever-changing tournament, the only rule is to ‘roll with the changes.[/i]
notes: As the competition gets tougher, even the mightiest warriors must learn to roll with the punches.
